import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./style.css"; const Temp = () => { const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState("Guwahati"); const getWeatherInfo = async () =>{ try { let url = `api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${searchValue}&appid=c897e6651cccad5b79b428405d2d598c`; } catch(error) { console.log(error); } }; useEffect(() => { getWeatherInfo(); }, []); return ( <>
setSearchValue(e.target.value)} />
{/* our temp card */}
25.5°
sunny
Guwahati, India
{ new Date().toLocaleString() }
{/* our 4column section */}

19:19 PM

); }; export default Temp;
